ygData.subject: Re: monk
ygData.msgSnippet: You can also use your round kick, and other attacks beyond that, they are magical too. ... From: Michael Wyatt  To: EverQuest@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
You can also use your round kick, and other attacks beyond that, they are
magical too.
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Wyatt <mwyatt@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 7:20 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: monk


>From: "Michael Wyatt" <mwyatt@...>
>
>Yeah you can. If it is an undead that can only be hit by magical
>weapons then you will need to wear magic gloves of some sort, such
>as netted, woven, mesh or lupine.
>
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Kevin Nguyen [mailto:miniydr@...]
>> Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 12:05 PM
>> To: everquest@onelist.com; soral25@...
>> Subject: [EverQuest] monk
>>
>>
>> From: "Kevin Nguyen" <miniydr@...>
>>
>> I was wondering if a monk is able to fight an undead creature in
>> hand to hand combat. would really like to know. thx
>>
>>
